title: New Funding Fuels Healthcare Hiring
itunes:title: New Funding Fuels Healthcare Hiring
description:
Dr. Iman Abuzeid, Co-Founder and CEO at Incredible Health, discusses the a career marketplace using new funding to combat the nursing shortage in the U.S.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Katie Greifeld. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
